org.jeo.json

Class JeoJSONWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jeo.json.encoder.JSONEncoder
      • org.jeo.geojson.GeoJSONWriter
        • org.jeo.json.JeoJSONWriter

  • public class JeoJSONWriter
extends GeoJSONWriter
    Writes common jeo objects as JSON.

    Example: 

    
 Writer w = ...;
 Dataset data = ...;

 JeoJSONWriter writer = new JeoJSONWriter(w);
 writer.object()
 writer.key("data").dataset(data)
 writer.endObject();

    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, Boundless
